headline: Are Shares of PPG Attractive After Analyst Upgrades and Specialty Coatings Acquisitions?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether PPG Industries is trading at an attractive price right now, you are not alone. Many investors want to know if the stock is a bargain or a trap. While PPG's shares are down 16.9% year-to-date and have slipped nearly 19% over the past year, the past week saw a 1% uptick, signaling some renewed interest or changes in sentiment.
